original_text: For they did not come to meet you with bread and water on your way when you came out of Egypt, and they hired Balaam son of Beor from Pethor in Aram Naharaim to pronounce a curse on you.
korean_text: 그들은 너희가 애굽에서 나올 때에 떡과 물로 너희를 길에서 영접하지 아니하고 메소보다미아의 브돌 사람 브올의 아들 발람에게 뇌물을 주어 너희를 저주하게 하려 하였으나

sentences.original_text: For they did not come to meet you
with bread and water on your way
when you came out of Egypt
and they hired Balaam son of Beor
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 브올의 아들 발람을 고용했습니다

sentences.original_text: to pronounce a curse on you
